metadata.title: USN-5376-2 -- Git vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-5376-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Git. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   俞晨东 discovered that Git incorrectly handled certain repository paths  in platforms with multiple users support. An attacker could possibly use  this issue to run arbitrary commands.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5376-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  git - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 gitweb - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-gui - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-daemon-sysvinit - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 gitk - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-all - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-mediawiki - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-daemon-run - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-man - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-doc - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-svn - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-cvs - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 git-email - 1:2.34.1-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
